About AmTrans

Dependable Heavy Haul & Specialized Transport

AM Trans delivers precision, power, and reliability across every mile. From oversized freight to complex rigging operations, our team moves America’s toughest loads with confidence and care.

Who we are

We are a specialized transport company focusing on oversized and high-value freight. Our team handles permits, route planning, escort coordination, and professional dispatch to ensure timely and safe delivery for every project.

Our Capabilities

  • Heavy Haul / Oversize freight
  • Specialized Transport & Rigging Support
  • Permit, route, and escort coordination
  • Dedicated and project-based capacity
